doc:
Pedro Armendáriz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pedro_Armend%C3%A1riz 0 Pedro Armendáriz (born Pedro Gregorio Armendáriz Hastings; May 9, 1912 – June 18, 1963) was a Mexican film actor who made films in both Mexico and the United States. With Dolores del Río and María Félix, he was one of the best-known Latin American movie stars of the 1940s and 1950s. Pedro_Armendáriz ( born Pedro_Gregorio_Armendáriz_Hastings ; May_9_,_1912 – June_18_,_1963 ) was a_Mexican_film_actor who made films in both_Mexico and the_United_States . With Dolores_del_Río and María_Félix , he was one of the_best-known_Latin_American_movie_stars of the_1940s_and_1950s .
